original_text: Therefore thus says the Lord God: Behold, I will bring a sword upon you, and will cut off from you man and beast,
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내가 칼이 네게 임하게 하여 네게서 사람과 짐승을 끊은즉

sentences.original_text: Therefore thus says the Lord God:
I will bring a sword upon you,
and will cut off from you man and beast,
